about.intro: Hello! I'm Alexandre, a web developer driven by curiosity and the desire to innovate. I enjoy combining technology and creativity to transform challenges into solutions. I work with Vue, Laravel, but I also like to explore projects involving AI and Machine Learning, always seeking to transform concepts into inspiring digital experiences.

about_me.text: Since I was young, I've always been driven by curiosity and the desire to understand how things work. When I got my first computer, I discovered a universe of possibilities and realized I could create what I had only imagined before. In 2020, during the pandemic, I rediscovered programming through Gustavo Guanabara's video course and fell in love with the field. Since then, I've been studying technology, exploring new languages, frameworks, and concepts of AI and Machine Learning. Today, I focus on web development with Vue and Laravel, creating functional and well-structured applications. At PUC-PR, I have the opportunity to transform ideas into real projects, integrating innovation, design, and data analysis to develop impactful solutions.

iforense.description: I work on the Analisys project, a monolithic system focused on digital investigations, developed with Laravel, Vue 3, using MongoDB and MySQL together in the database. I am responsible for the development and maintenance of the system interfaces, focusing on usability, security, and compliance with LGPD (Brazilian General Data Protection Law). In addition to the visual layer, I also work on implementing backend functionalities, especially in the processes of inserting and querying sensitive data, ensuring compliance with legal and operational requirements. One of the main challenges of the project is ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), given the volume and sensitivity of the information handled, balancing security, performance, and user experience. I have contributed to the technical evolution of the system with a focus on scalability, code clarity, and organization of reusable components in the frontend, in addition to secure integration with the database.

bwise.description: I worked on developing the company's main accounting platform, participating from the choice of technologies and frameworks to the definition of the visual identity and component structure. This was my first experience leading a larger-scale project technically, which gave me a broader view of software architecture and requirements management. The system was developed with Vue 3 and Bootstrap, focusing on dynamism and adaptation to different tax and fiscal rules according to state and user profile, making the experience more intuitive and efficient. I also implemented automated tests with Vitest, ensuring the reliability of critical modules, especially in the reports generated by the platform. In addition to this project, I also collaborated on developing TimeSheet, an internal time tracking system, where employees recorded their working hours and linked their activities to respective clients. This project was developed with Vue 3 and Bootstrap and required special attention to precision in time handling and correct calculation for billing purposes. Working with this type of data brought important technical challenges, especially related to consistency and integrity of information in real-time. This experience allowed me to work on multiple projects in parallel, improve my technical organization, enhance my communication with other company departments, and deepen my knowledge about complex business rules.

cedaspy.description: I actively participated in the development and monitoring of web projects, ensuring adherence to technical objectives and established deadlines. I worked from solution conception to implementation and production monitoring. I was responsible for creating landing pages optimized for SEO, which generated a significant increase in the company's lead capture. I also implemented performance improvements in internal systems, including developing a search API for administrative dashboards. I was responsible for part of the development and maintenance of institutional websites using WordPress, PHP, and Bootstrap, focusing on responsiveness, visual standardization, and accessibility best practices. I worked collaboratively on building the company's educational system, developed in ReactJS, contributing to the creation of reusable components and interface structuring. Additionally, I participated in identifying and correcting failures in legacy systems. I always prioritized writing clean, maintainable code aligned with agile development best practices.

grume.title: GRUME - Music Group
grume.description: I developed a website dedicated to Professor Danilo Ramos, with the goal of creating a centralized space to publicize music study group projects. Additionally, I implemented an exclusive section for sharing materials with students, making access more practical and interactive. The project highlights my ability to create personalized, functional solutions focused on user experience.

ai_research.title: AI Ethics Research
ai_research.description: The research analyzes the challenges of transparency and explainability in Artificial Intelligence systems, discussing how the complexity of neural networks and the black-box phenomenon hinder understanding of automated decisions. The study highlights the importance of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI), with methods like LIME, SHAP, and Grad-CAM, which make models more understandable and auditable. It also addresses the ethical and legal impact of algorithmic opacity, arguing that the AI of the future must be understandable, responsible, and human-centered, balancing technical performance and moral clarity.
